---
title: "HFV Colors"
---

HousingForward Virginia uses a six-color palette.

```{r}

library(scales)
library(chroma)

hfv_pal <- c(
  "#011e41", # Shadow
  "#40c0c0", # Sky
  "#8b85ca", # Lilac
  "#259591", # Grass
  "#b1005f", # Berry
  "#e0592a"  # Desert
  )

scales::show_col(hfv_pal, borders = "#ffffff", cex_label = 0.8, ncol = 3)

```

```{r}


chroma::show_col(interp_colors(12, colors = c("#ccd2d9", "#011e41"), interp = "bezier"))


```
